    public class PlaceStatus
extends BaseStatus
    The status item that displays information on a Place.
    Author:
    Miquel Martin

    • Constructor Detail

      • PlaceStatus

        public PlaceStatus(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite parent,
           Place place,
           org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Image icon,
           String colorString,
           GUI gui,
           PlacesPanel placesPanel)
        Create a placestatus using a string to describe the color of the marker.
        Parameters:
        parent - the parent composite
        place - the place to display information about
        icon - the icon to show next to the place
        colorString - a string of the form "#RRBBGG"
        gui - the container gui
        placesPanel - the panel that contains all the status items

      • PlaceStatus

        public PlaceStatus(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite parent,
           Place place,
           org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Image icon,
           org.eclipse.swt.graphics.RGB rgbColor,
           GUI gui,
           PlacesPanel placesPanel)
        Create a place status item to display place information.
        Parameters:
        parent - the parent composite
        place - the place to display information about
        icon - the icon to show next to the place
        rgbColor - the color of the marker
        gui - the container gui
        placesPanel - the panel that contains all the status items
